document.full_text: baidu inc, china's top search engine, will launch a licensed music search service in may, in a move to legitimize its current music search that critics say enables music piracy.
document.title: baidu to launch licensed music service in may
lines_and_colors: baidu inc, china's top search engine, will launch a licensed music search service in may, in a move to legitimize its current music search that critics say enables music piracy.
